#used all data

```{r}
library(haven)
library(ggplot2)
library(labelled)
exit <- read_dta("~/Desktop/IPA/Exit Survey/Exit_survey_Jun27.dta")
lang <- exit$language
table(lang)

xlabels <- val_labels(lang) ##extract labels of languages

## names(xlabels)

ggplot(exit, aes(x=language))+ geom_bar(aes(y=(..count..)/sum(..count..))) + 
  scale_x_discrete(limits=names(xlabels), labels=names(xlabels)) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1, size = 12)) +
  geom_text(aes(label = ..count.., y= ..prop..), stat= "count", vjust = -.1) +
  ylab("Frequency") +
  xlab("Preferred Language") +
  ggtitle("Breakdown of Preferred Language")

```
